com.betfair.cougar.core.impl.logging

Interface LogBootstrap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CougarLog4JBootstrap, NullLogBootstrap

    public interface LogBootstrap
    This interface describes a class that is used to bootstrap the logging system if you don't want an initialisation class, then ensure the System variable is null - you would want to do this if you have your own appender config for log4j If you want to initialise a logging system that is not log4j, then point the System variable to your own implementation of this interface. cougar.core.log.bootstrap.class System variable to point to your implementation See @CougarLog4JBootstrap

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(Properties properties)
      Launch the logging system

      • init

          throws IOException
